hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Musa Al-Ash’ari that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The people will be presented (before Allah) three times on the Day of Resurrection. The first two times will be for disputes and excuses, and the third time will be when the scrolls (of deeds) fly into their hands; some will take it in the right hand and some in the left.”
